articles.description: Spotify's 2020 Wrapped has a global top five of just men, despite this year being all about the pop queens. Are listeners simply sexist?
articles.content: When I think of this year in music, I think of women. I think of Dua Lipa, who brought unexpected joy at the start of a pandemic by releasing her shimmering disco album Future Nostalgia, while less c… [+1686 chars]

articles.author: Tim Robey
articles.title: Elliot Page has been through enough – let the ‘deadnaming’ stop now - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: The Juno star's transition could be a watershed moment, for Hollywood and the world. But first we need to get his name right
articles.content: Elliot Page. This is the name of Hollywoods most visible trans star, as of yesterdays announcement on social media. Using the right name, and the right pronouns he will be using he/they henceforth is… [+1793 chars]
